articles.title: Chatbots can be manipulated through flattery and peer pressure
articles.description: Generally, AI chatbots are not supposed to do things like call you names or tell you how to make controlled substances. But, just like a person, with the right psychological tactics, it seems like at least some LLMs can be convinced to break their own rules. articles.title: Meta is struggling to rein in its AI chatbots
